Description:
Detects the ld.so preload persistence file. See `man ld.so` for more information.

Author: Christian Burkard (Nextron Systems)
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: Code Injection by ld.so Preload
Query: sourcetype like 'linux-%' eql select * from _source_ where log like '%/etc/ld.so.preload%'
